title: Quick Tabs Sync Removal v1.6.3
details:
## Quick Tabs Cross-Tab Sync Removal (v1.6.3)

On November 27, 2025, all cross-tab synchronization infrastructure was removed from Quick Tabs, resulting in a simplified single-tab system.

### Files Deleted:
- `src/features/quick-tabs/sync/` directory (BroadcastSync.js, BroadcastChannelFactory.js, CircuitBreaker.js, MemoryMonitor.js)
- `src/features/quick-tabs/coordinators/SyncCoordinator.js`
- `src/features/quick-tabs/managers/StorageManager.js`
- 28+ related test files

### Files Modified:
- `src/features/quick-tabs/index.js` - Removed sync/storage initialization
- `src/features/quick-tabs/coordinators/UICoordinator.js` - Simplified
- `src/features/quick-tabs/managers/StateManager.js` - Removed hydration
- All handlers - Removed storage/background communication
- `src/content.js` - Removed sync handler

### Result:
- Quick Tabs now work only within a single tab
- No cross-tab visibility, no persistence
- ~12,900+ lines removed
- Simpler, faster, no race conditions
- Foundation ready for future sync rebuild
